definition: because of/on the basis of/in view of/on account of
to go/to take/sentence-final interrogative particle/variant of 於|于[yu2]

sentences.chinese: 更新基于映像部署的客户机。

sentences.english: The findings are based on detailed radar measurements of ice caps on Mars.
sentences.chinese: 这些发现是基于对火星冰冠的详细雷达测定数据。

sentences.english: A simple hierarchical coarse-to-fine edge detection method based on the direction of potential edge elements is given.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种基于边界点方向的新的边界检测方法。

sentences.english: Obama's daughters are not to get "swine flu" jabs because of risk.
sentences.chinese: 奥巴马的女儿们基于风险，不要猪流感刺戳。

sentences.english: A design method of PCI Slave IP which based on multi-state machine structure is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基于多状态机结构的从PCI设计方法。

sentences.english: Dynamic reliability analysis and compare of rail based on random process over-crossing theory;
sentences.chinese: 基于随机过程理论对物流活动中的库存管理进行优化。

sentences.english: Based on randomizing techniques, this paper discussed how the sketch-based approach estimates approximate answers to aggregate queries.
sentences.chinese: 讨论了基于草图的复杂聚集查询的近似处理算法。

sentences.english: This text introduces a measure system based on Single chip which can monitor displacements of the paper cutter.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种基于单片机的切纸机位移测量系统。

sentences.english: This is the multi-category statistical analysis based on the information entropy.
sentences.chinese: 这就是基于信息熵的多类统计判别分析。

sentences.english: One Is, that both plots showed up on the same figure.
sentences.chinese: 一件事是，两个图都是基于相同的数据。

sentences.english: Because the existing system is based on having an enemy.
sentences.chinese: 因为其现行制度是基于一个假想敌。

sentences.english: Lysithea system is an Enterprise Application System based on J2EE Platform.
sentences.chinese: 该系统是一个基于J2EE平台的企业级应用。

sentences.english: A dual-channel instantaneous soil radon measurement instrument based on the method of electrostatic collection is designed.
sentences.chinese: 设计一套基于静电收集法的双道瞬时土壤测氡仪。

sentences.english: Sepals oblong or linear, erect or spreading, base of lateral pair saccate .
sentences.chinese: 萼片长圆形或线形，直立或开展，基于侧配对。

sentences.english: Study the calculational methods of combinatorial sprinkler uniformity based on the above-mentioned mapped model.
sentences.chinese: 研究了基于上述映射模型的喷灌组合均匀度计算方法。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
to exploit (a resource)/to open up (for development)/to develop
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
